about_the_game:
What would happen if we put the theropods together and looked for the coolest of them all? Choose your favorite dinosaur and find out by competing in...

LOCAL AND REMOTE PLAY MULTIPLAYER FUN!


Immerse yourself in the fun whether alone or with friends; Up to 4 players can enjoy the multiplayer experience locally or through Steam Remote Play. Discover the thrills of “Treasure Bridge” mode which offers a wide variety of our mini-games!

"Treasure Bridge" Mode

Get ready for the ultimate competition! Take on your friends in an exciting race towards the magnificent treasure. Only a skilled player will overcome each challenge of our mini-games, build their bridge first and be crowned the undisputed winner! Do you have what it takes to claim the treasure?

VARIETY OF MINI-GAMES!


Challenge your friends in a variety of exciting mini-games that will only increase! Survive the great rain of rocks in "Eruption"! or avoid the dangerous Triceratops in "Stampede"! The fun never stops in PartySaur: Dino Mayhem, so come and show off your skill and dexterity!

VARIETY OF CHARACTERS!


Embark on the exciting adventures of Fang Island with our charismatic, tender and unique characters that we have for you. Choose your favorite and join the wildest and funniest competition you've ever experienced in PartySaur: Dino Mayhem!

UNIQUE STYLES!


Explore your inner dinosaur and unleash all your style. Do you want a duck as a hat? We have it! Are you looking for an elegant suit to stand out among your friends? Of course! At PartySaur you can find that and much more to personalize your experience and shine in each competition!

name: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3200G or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem is a casual 1 - 4 player local multiplayer action game where players battle each other in a variety of mini-games set in a prehistoric environment. Defeat your rivals and become the PartySaur champion.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
